amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore funding to worker protection agencies, offset with DOL/HHS/ED program administration funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 134 printed in House Report 115-297 to restore funding to worker protection agencies, offset with DOL/HHS/ED program administration funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A126) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 219 (Roll no. 500).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A126) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 219 (Roll no. 500).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A126) offered by Mr. Pocan.
